title: Software Engineer, Networking
description: Develop software for Cisco's next-generation networking products.
requirements: Bachelor's or Master's degree in CS or EE
3+ years of experience in software development
Proficiency in C/C++ and experience with network protocols
responsibilities: Design and implement software features for network devices
Debug and troubleshoot complex networking issues
Collaborate with hardware and QA teams

title: Cybersecurity Engineer
description: Design, implement, and maintain cybersecurity solutions for Cisco's products and infrastructure.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Cybersecurity or related field
Knowledge of security frameworks (e.g., NIST, ISO 27001)
responsibilities: Conduct security assessments and penetration testing

title: Cloud Solutions Architect
description: Provide technical leadership and guidance to customers adopting Cisco's cloud solutions.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in a technical field
7+ years of experience in cloud architecture or consulting
responsibilities: Design and propose cloud solutions to customers
Collaborate with sales and product teams

title: Technical Marketing Engineer
description: Bridge the gap between engineering and marketing by creating technical content and demonstrations.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in CS or EE
3+ years of experience in technical marketing or product management

title: Software Engineer, Collaboration
description: Develop software for Cisco's collaboration products (e.g., Webex).
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
3+ years of experience in software development
responsibilities: Design and implement features for collaboration platforms
Work with cross-functional teams to deliver new features
